article_title: Hilton Head company finds niche in telemedicine
article_text: iSelectMD, which started in 2010 on Hilton Head Island, is an over-the-phone medical service that connects patients with nonemergency ailments to certified physicians. It's part of an emerging trend in health care called telemedicine, an umbrella-term for services that use technology -- video, telephones, even social media -- to bridge the gap between doctor and patient.

article_metadata.news-keywords: iSelectMD, telemedicine, huffington, post, surgeon, general, Michael, Iaquinta, healthcare, Affordable, care, act, cost, money, app

article_summary:
iSelectMD, which started in 2010 on Hilton Head Island, is an over-the-phone medical service that connects patients with nonemergency ailments to certified physicians.
It's part of an emerging trend in health care called telemedicine, an umbrella-term for services that use technology -- video, telephones, even social media -- to bridge the gap between doctor and patient.
